verses.roman:
kṛpā kari' yadi more kariyācha uddhāra
āpana-kṛpāte kaha 'kartavya' āmāra

synonyms: kṛpā kari'—by Your causeless mercy; yadi—if; more—unto me; kariyācha—You have done; uddhāra—deliverance; āpana-kṛpāte—by Your own mercy; kaha—please speak; kartavya āmāra—my duty.
translation: "Out of Your causeless mercy, You have delivered me from the materialistic path. Now, by the same causeless mercy, please tell me what my duty is.
